content: head stitches with a tapestry needle round 1 k2 yo k2tog k to end with the purl side facing forward stitch the cast- round 2 knit on edge of each ear to the body a few stitches round 3 k14 k2tog yo k2 back from an eye as you weave in the ends round 4 knit you can stitch the ears down against the head round 5 k2tog k1 6 times 12 sts point them upright or leave them free and floppy stuff the piece filling out the shape fully without over-stuffing tail round 6 k2tog 6 times 6 sts with the main color cast 2 stitches onto one dpn break the yarn and draw it tightly through the knit 6 row of i-cord stitches with a tapestry needle break the yarn and draw it tightly through the stitches with a tapestry needle legs make 2 with the main color cast 3 stitches onto one with the tail still on the tapestry needle insert dpn the end of the i-cord into the body just above knit 9 row of i-cord then break the yarn and the cast-on area pull the i-cord partially into the draw it tightly through the stitches with a tapestry body pull it farther in for a short stubby tail needle with the tail still on the tapestry needle draw the weave in the loose ends i-cord through two yarnover holes on the body to form two front legs or two back legs weave the loose ends back through the i-cords © 2025 mochimochi land llc all and the body rights reserved please do not copy or distribute any part of this pattern without permission please do not sell items made from this pattern without permission short dog long dog by anna hrachovec mochimochiland com 2
